h1_title: Water Curtain Cave and Birthstone Walkthrough
content: When you've depleted his health bar, a cutscene will . The Stone Monkey's arms will start to glow, and suddenly, they'll be ablaze. This is when the second phase of the fight starts, which is far more difficult, and his health bar will be fully replenished.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Water_Curtain_Cave_and_Birthstone_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Water Curtain Cave and Birthstone Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Birthstone - Heart of Birthstone' and the sub-subsection 'Stone Monkey Phase Two'.
The content is as follows:
When you've depleted his health bar, a cutscene will . The Stone Monkey's arms will start to glow, and suddenly, they'll be ablaze. This is when the second phase of the fight starts, which is far more difficult, and his health bar will be fully replenished.
